description: Core logic implementation of a Tic Tac Toe game, including game state management, move validation, win/draw detection, and game reset functionality.

classes.name: TicTacToeGame
classes.description: A class encapsulating the state and logic for a Tic Tac Toe game, including move processing, win/draw detection, and game reset.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets the game state to initial conditions, clearing the board and resetting all internal variables.

methods.name: isGameOver
methods.description: A getter that returns true if the game has a winner or is a draw.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Attempts to make a move at the specified index for the current player; updates game state accordingly.

methods.name: _togglePlayer
methods.description: Switches the current player from 'X' to 'O' or vice versa.

methods.name: _evaluateState
methods.description: Evaluates the current board to determine if there's a winner or the game is a draw, updating internal state.
